featured.text: Scientists found that sharp corners are natural weak spots where stress concentrates.
Right-brained learners look for a general picture and concentrate on relating new information to what they already know.

other.text: 30 , baseball fans are more content to concentrate on the game’s finer details and spend the breaks between innings filling out their own private scorecards.
Left-brained learners usually concentrate on memorizing les and lists.
The rainfall concentrates in some spots.

definition.zh_def: 集中注意力或力量於某一事物上。
definition.en_def: To focus one's attention or mental effort on a particular task or subject.
definition.example: It's hard to concentrate when there are so many distractions around.
